summary: This module defines a graph‑based implementation of the RNN‑Transducer loss using the k2 weighted finite‑state transducer library. It provides a base class for graph transducer losses and a concrete loss class that exposes the internal alignment grid, temporal and unit schemas, and supports state relabeling to enable flexible and efficient loss computation for speech models.
business_intent: Enable high‑performance, configurable training of speech recognition models (especially RNN‑Transducer architectures) within the NVIDIA NeMo framework by leveraging k2 graph operations for accurate loss calculation.
